context_of_use: The customer initiates the checkout process to purchase selected items using various payment methods.
stakeholders_and_interests: customer: wants to choose the most convenient payment option
description: Handles the order checkout flow, including selection of payment methods and completing purchases.
triggering_event: Customer decides to complete the purchase of items in the cart.
preconditions: Customer has items in the cart
Customer is logged into the system
assumptions: Customer has a valid payment method available
requirements_met: The system shall allow customers to checkout using multiple payment methods.
main_flow: 1. Customer selects the checkout option → System displays payment method options.
2. Customer chooses a payment method → System processes the payment.
3. Customer confirms the order → System confirms the order and provides a receipt.
exception_flows: EF-1 (from Step 2): If payment fails, System notifies the customer and prompts for a different payment method.
